orange fabric pouch with match zipper, gray zipper pull, and adjustable hip belt.', }, { id: 2, name: 'Medium Stuff Satchel', href: '#', color: 'Blue', price: '$32.00', quantity: 1, imageSrc: drawstring top, and front zipper pouch.', }, ] export default function CartCom() { const CartIsOpen = useSelector(state => state.CartReducer.CartIsOpen); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [open, setOpen] = useState(CartIsOpen) const CartItems = useSelector(state => state.CartItemsReducer.CartItems); const HandleClose = () => { dispatch(CLOSE_CART()); } const CalcTotal = () => { var total = 0; CartItems.map((item) =>{ total = total + (item.product.price * item.qty); }) return total; } return (
